name: Housing Counseling Information
short_desc: Provides list of housing counseling agencies by county or by city. Most of the agencies provide Homebuyer Education Programs, Marketing and Outreach Initiatives, Mortgage Delinquency and Default Resolution Counseling, Post-purchase Counseling, Pre-purchas.....more
description: Provides list of housing counseling agencies by county or by city. Most of the agencies provide Homebuyer Education Programs, Marketing and Outreach Initiatives, Mortgage Delinquency and Default Resolution Counseling, Post-purchase Counseling, Pre-purchase Counseling, and Renters Assistance.
